entries.title: More Than 150 International Organizations Call on Biden to Close Guantánamo on 21st Anniversary
entries.description:
Guantánamo Bay “is the iconic example of the abandonment of the rule of law,” the letter argues.

The post More Than 150 International Organizations Call on Biden to Close Guantánamo on 21st Anniversary appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: New Stock Listings Open the Door to American Investment in the Israeli Occupation
entries.description:
NYSE is partnering with an Israeli exchange, making it easier for Americans to invest in companies supporting Palestinian human rights abuses.

The post New Stock Listings Open the Door to American Investment in the Israeli Occupation appeared first on The Intercept.
